resources.string: Already have an account Log In
Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions.
You are not registered yet. Use the registration button to complete your registration.
Your email or password is already in use
*Make sure to read all instructions before Attempting Quiz
Number of original members in Justice league?

Please read below instruction very carefully:-

 1. This quiz is hosted by Appteam of NIT Hamirpur.

 2. Important: Make sure that your device remains connected to Internet while attempting quiz.

 3. Make sure that all personal information about you in current account is correct, otherwise you may be disqualified.

 4. When you enter the quiz, you will be provided with a set of 10 randomly chosen questions.

 5. Each question is unique and will not appear again. 

 6. Their is no negative marking for wrong answer, so it is better to attempt all questions. And for correct answer you will be provided one point.

 7. Important: Time limit to attempt a set of question is 24 second x 10 question = 240 seconds, i.e. 4 minutes. 
You have to finish the quiz in 4 minutes to make your score count.

 8. After attempting all questions press finish button to submit your inputs. After 4 minutes, inputs will automatically gets submitted.

 9. Important: Make sure u are connected to internet wile attempting quiz, and while making submission.

 10. Do not close app after starting quiz, because you will be given only one attempt to each set of questions.

 11. After clicking on submit you will be shown only score corresponding to that set of questions.

 12. Advice: Attempt as many sets possible to score more points.

 13. Winners will be announced after Hillffair 2016, and will be rewarded.

 14. For any queries/complaints/bugs, contact us at appteam.nith@gmail.com

This project is currently licensed under the GNU General Public License v3.

 	Glide

 	Android Retrofit Library

 	Load Toast

HILL\'FFAIR, the annual cultural fest of NIT Hamirpur, boasts of being a three day extravaganza filled with fun, frolic and excitement. Since the time its roots were laid, way back in 1988, it has only grown and grown in every aspect - be it the standards, popularity or the level of competition. No wonder, today, HILL\'FFAIR is one of the major college fests in northern India! \n \n The event celebrates cultural diversity- equally respecting the East and the West. We take great pleasure in informing you that this year\’s theme is \“La Vendimia – The Retro Revival\”. And we are sure to set the golden age of the 70\’s rolling again, amidst unparalleled joy and celebrations, which will capture the essence and mirth of the yester years.
